pull.title: BIPs 67 and 301: fix links
pull.body: The original master file has been changed, and the line numbers referenced by the original URL are no longer accurate. Therefore, a fixed permanent link is used to replace it. The purpose of adopting a permanent link is to prevent the line numbers originally pointed to by the URL from becoming inaccurate again when further changes are made to the master branch.

events.body: It would help if this pull request came with a bit of context on how you determined the suggested URLs to be the correct replacement of the originals.

> It would help if this pull request came with a bit of context on how you determined the suggested URLs to be the correct replacement of the originals.

Thanks for your review. I have provided the description.

comments.diff_hunk:

-* [[https://github.com/bitcoinj/bitcoinj/blob/master/core/src/main/java/org/bitcoinj/script/ScriptBuilder.java#L331|BitcoinJ]]

comments.body:
Sorry for this wrong fix. 

Would https://github.com/bitcoinj/bitcoinj/blob/f7ea0b92a619800c143b0142dc70306da33119a9/core/src/main/java/org/bitcoinj/script/ScriptBuilder.java#L335 be more appropriate here? L335 points to the function rather than the comment quote.

comments.body: The link title was last updated by a BIP author, Thomas Kerin, in 1c000480 without changing the URL. Would retain the original intent of pointing to the start of the Doxygen above the function.
